name: 施青良
objective: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
schedule:
Week 1-3 Building Supporting Skills
1)　　Learner Strategies
2)　　Note-taking, Paraphrasing, and Summarizing
3)　　Pronunciation
4)　　Vocabulary

Week 4-8 Reading (I) [page 1-48]
1)　　Understanding Vocabulary from Context
2)　　Recognizing Referents
3)　　Simplifying Meanings of Sentences
4)　　Inserting Sentences into the Passage

Week 9 Review; Practice Test

Week 10-12 Listening (I)  [page 117-138]
1)　　Understanding the Gist
2)　　Understanding the Details

Week 13-15 Speaking (I) [page 183-197]
1)　　Plan the Free-Choice Response
2)　　Make the Free-Choice Response

Week 16-17 Writing: Error Correction [page 514-550]
1)　　Subject/Verb Agreement
2)　　Parallel Structure
3)　　Verb Forms
4)　　Verb Uses
5)　　Use –ed and –ing Adjectives Correctly

Week 18 Final Exam
materials: Philips, Deborah. Longman Preparation for the TOEFL Test: iBT. Second Edition.
